name: Flight Trail Rush
description:
FlightTrail Rush is a shelved prototype intended for mobile devices. Made with Polyfruit Studios LTD. 

----------------------------

Play as a Lumberjack who's aim is to glide around and cut his path through the trees.

The more wood you cut, the higher your score!

CONTROLS

W  up,   A   left,   S   down,    D   right

Design & Level Design

Tom Skeys 

Kian Jackson
